import React, {useState} from 'react' import reactDom, {Fragment} from 'react' import{Link, BrowserRouter , Switch , Route } from 'react-router-dom' import './css/style.css' import './css/nav.css' import './css/EasyFramer.css' const FlutterwaveNav = () =>{ let fullWidthClass = [ 'full-frame', 'fixed-to-top', 'pad-top-10', 'pad-bottom-10', ] let mobileNavClass = [] let desktopNavClass = [] let mobileClass = 'mobile-navigations d-md-hide' let [isOpen, setIsOpen] = useState(false) let [mClass, setMClass] = useState('d-nothimg out-of-view') let [toggler, setToggler] = useState('mobile-toggler relative change-toggle pad-top-15') const openNav = () => { setIsOpen(!isOpen) setMClass(mClass.includes('d-nothing') ? "" : 'd-nothing out-of-view') setToggler(toggler.includes('change-toggle') ? 'mobile-toggler relative pad-top-15' : 'mobile-toggler relative change-toggle pad-top-15') } return(
Flutterwave
Flutterwave
) } export default FlutterwaveNav
